com.sudoplay.axion

Class AxionConfigurationProtection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sudoplay.axion.AxionConfigurationProtection

  • public class AxionConfigurationProtection
extends java.lang.Object
    The AxionConfigurationProtection class manages the protection level of the AxionConfiguration it belongs to.
    Author:
    Jason Taylor

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected static class  AxionConfigurationProtection.ProtectionMode
      The protection mode for an AxionConfiguration.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AxionConfigurationProtection

        protected AxionConfigurationProtection(AxionConfigurationProtection.ProtectionMode newConfigurationProtectionMode)
        Creates a new instance of AxionConfigurationProtection with the give AxionConfigurationProtection.ProtectionMode.
        Parameters:
        newConfigurationProtectionMode -

    • Method Detail

      • lock

        protected void lock()
        Changes the protection mode to Locked. Any attempt to change this configuration while it is locked will result in an exception. Use unlock() to unlock.

        Can't use when Immutable.

        See Also:
        unlock(), setImmutable()

      • unlock

        protected void unlock()
        Changes the protection mode to Unlocked.

        Can't use when Immutable.

        See Also:
        lock(), setImmutable()

      • setImmutable

        protected void setImmutable()
        Changes the protection mode to Immutable. Once this mode is set, it can't be undone.
        See Also:
        lock(), unlock()

      • isLocked

        protected boolean isLocked()
        Returns:
        true if protection mode is Locked

      • isUnlocked

        protected boolean isUnlocked()
        Returns:
        true if protection mode is Unlocked

      • isImmutable

        protected boolean isImmutable()
        Returns:
        true if protection mode is Immutable

      • assertUnlocked

        protected void assertUnlocked()
                       throws AxionConfigurationException
        Throws:
        AxionConfigurationException - if protection mode is Locked

      • assertMutable

        protected void assertMutable()
                      throws AxionConfigurationException
        Throws:
        AxionConfigurationException - if protection mode is Immutable
